document_data.name: ''Idle Dice''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Idle dice''''' was a set of two enchanted [[dice]].
document_data.Description: ''Idle dice'' were six-sided dice. They were crafted out of [[silver]]y metal, had sharp edges, and runes embossed on the sides of the cubes. These were the numbers 1 to 6 in [[Dethek]], the [[dwarf|dwarven]] script.
document_data.Powers: ''Idle dice'' allowed their owner to provide small amounts of healing to a random ally. The healing potency and target were determined via a literal roll of ''idle dice''. This ability was known as the ''song of rest.''
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Calliope]]: a [[bard]] adventurer owned a pair of ''idle dice'' during her time working with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
